abstract.p: B Com3 Group will reorganize management of its largest agency networks, Leo Burnett Worldwide and D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles Worldwide; Roger A Haupt, chief executive at B Com3, gives up his post as chief executive at Burnett to Linda Wolf, who has been chief executive of Burnett's US operations; Haupt will concentrate on his duties at B Com3; Wolf also takes title of chairwoman at Burnett; Richard B Fizdale, who had been chairman at Burnett, continues as vice chairman at B Com3; Robert C Brennan becomes president at Burnett, replacing James Oates, who retired; Stephen J Gatfield becomes chief operating officer; at D'Arcy, Arthur Selkowitz, chairman and chief executive, is relinquishing his duties there to take new post of vice chairman and cheif client officer at B Com3; John Farrell is promoted to president and chief executive, and Susan Gianinno becomes chairwoman (S)

block.p: The B Com3 Group in Chicago said yesterday that it would reorganize management of its largest agency networks, Leo Burnett Worldwide in Chicago and D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles Worldwide in New York.

Two top executives are relinquishing their posts at Burnett to concentrate on their duties at B Com3. Roger A. Haupt, 52, chief executive at B Com3, gives up his post as chief executive at Burnett to Linda Wolf, 52, who had been chief executive at Burnett's United States operations. Ms. Wolf also takes the title of chairwoman at Burnett; Richard B. Fizdale, 61, who had been chairman at Burnett, continues as vice chairman at B Com3.

The B Com3 Group in Chicago said yesterday that it would reorganize management of its largest agency networks, Leo Burnett Worldwide in Chicago and D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles Worldwide in New York.

Two top executives are relinquishing their posts at Burnett to concentrate on their duties at B Com3. Roger A. Haupt, 52, chief executive at B Com3, gives up his post as chief executive at Burnett to Linda Wolf, 52, who had been chief executive at Burnett's United States operations. Ms. Wolf also takes the title of chairwoman at Burnett; Richard B. Fizdale, 61, who had been chairman at Burnett, continues as vice chairman at B Com3.

Robert C. Brennan, 41, chief operating officer at the Starcom MediaVest Group, the media services unit of B Com3, becomes president at Burnett, responsible for North America. That post had most recently been held by James Oates, who retired late last year. Stephen J. Gatfield, 42, group president for the Asia-Pacific region of Burnett, becomes chief operating officer, overseeing all regions apart from North America; Mr. Haupt had been acting as chief operating officer.

At D'Arcy, Arthur Selkowitz, 56, chairman and chief executive, is relinquishing his duties there to take the new post of vice chairman and chief client officer at B Com3. The two presidents of D'Arcy Trans-Atlantic, responsible for the agency's operations in Africa, Europe, the Middle East and North America, are being promoted to assume Mr. Selkowitz's duties: John Farrell, 42, becomes president and chief executive, and Susan Gianinno, 50, becomes chairwoman, while continuing as chief branding officer.
